Tenant: Provide your Azure AD tenant's id (a guid) or the tenant's domain , like <mytenant>.onmicrosoft.com
ClientId: The clientid/appid that you got from the app registration
ClientSecret: [provide a client secret as configured on the Azure portal for this app registration]
CertificateName: [Or instead of client secret: Enter here the name of a certificate (from the user cert store) as registered with your application]
